articles.author: Volodymyr Verbianyi, Daryna Krasnolutska
articles.title: Ukrainians Defy Russia’s Attempts to Freeze Them Into Submission - Bloomberg
articles.description: With the temperature plunging and blackouts persisting, Europe worries how long Ukraine can hold out.
articles.content:
Since the power went out in the depths of the Ukrainian winter, Mariia Kozhenko puts her two children to sleep at night inside a tent set up on the bed of their Kyiv apartment to try to keep warm. 
… [+219 chars]
